name: Atlantis Sports Bar & Lounge
description: Atlantis Sports Bar & Lounge is open 24 hours and located directly adjacent to the Race & Sports Book — the center of the action for any group with sports bets running alongside tee times. Multiple screens cover national and international sports around the clock. Draft beer, whiskeys, and a full bar menu keep the group going whether it's a 6 AM tee time pre-game or a midnight wind-down after a day on the course. Part of a casino floor that includes 1,391 slot machines and 36 gaming tables.
shortDescription: 24-hour sports bar adjacent to the Race & Sports Book — multiple screens, draft beer, and full bar service.

faqs.question: Is the Sports Bar open during early morning tee times?
faqs.answer: Yes — the Atlantis Sports Bar & Lounge is open 24 hours, making it accessible before early tee times and after late rounds.

faqs.question: Can I place sports bets from the Sports Bar?
faqs.answer: The Sports Bar is directly adjacent to the Atlantis Race & Sports Book where bets are placed. The two areas are connected for easy access.

testimonials.quote: Great casino floor — clean and well maintained. The sports book area keeps the energy going throughout the day and night.
testimonials.author: TripAdvisor Traveler
